text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock ‘Target’... ‘An objective or result towards which efforts are directed’.
Can probs just relax on finding someone to blame, and maybe focus on continuing to direct efforts and in turn, move forward? Seems like the sensible thing to do 🤷‍♀️
